A contact can scan your barcode to add you to BBM
A contact can scan this barcode to join your group
"I'd like to invite you to chat over BBM."

"Why do I see a BBM icon at the top of the screen?
The BBM icon appears in the status bar because BBM is always on so that you are always connected."
Tap banner to view a profile
"This feature is not available at this moment. Coming soon"
Show What Others are Listening To
When you turn off the BBM Connected icon, BBM messages might not be delivered or delivery might be delayed if your device memory is low.

Contacts will be added to your Blocked list
Colon or comma not allowed in display name

On Android or iPhone, click %2$s to join the group or download BBM.
%3$s"
"You can delete for all members who haven't liked the picture."
Make sure that you and at least one other member are connected to the wireless network and try again.
There are no other members in this group, or you might have to ask a group member to re-invite you.
You are the last member, so your leaving will delete the group and erase all related data. This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
All group data, including the group calendar, lists, pictures and chats, will be deleted for all members. This action cannot be undone.

All group data, including group calendar, lists, pictures and chats, will be deleted for all members. This action cannot be undone.
You are the last member, so your leaving will delete the group and erase all related data. This action cannot be undone.
The calendar you are attempting to save this event in requires a non-empty subject.
The end time must be after the start time
We are unable to edit your BlackBerry ID at the moment, please try again later
"You are not an administrator for this group. Groups can have multiple administrators."
You are an administrator for this group.
To manage this group, contact a group administrator.
To manage this group, you can enter the administration password.
Administrators can do the following actions:
Any group member who enters this password will become an administrator.

%1$s is too large. The maximum file size is 6 MB

"I'd like to invite you to chat over BBM. BBM uses PINs instead of phone numbers or email addresses so that it's more private and you always control who can contact you. My BBM PIN is %1$s.
On Android or iPhone devices, click www.pin.bbm.com/%1$s to add me or download BBM.
On BlackBerry devices, click pin:%1$s to add me to BBM. Note: On some BlackBerry OS devices you may need to select pin:%1$s then press the menu key and choose \"Invite to BBM\"."
Add me to BBM! On BlackBerry, click pin:%1$s and select \"Invite to BBM\". On Android or iPhone, click www.pin.bbm.com/%1$s to add me or download BBM.
Align the back of your current devices. Both devices must have NFC turned on.
Do you want to turn on the NFC?
You have chosen to save your chats. This may not be permitted under local law. You should confirm that this is permitted before turning it on
Your chat history with all contacts will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
An Error Occurred While Sending the Report
To provide more information to BlackBerry Support, we require your email address and Support Incident ID number.
"BBM support is available online at http://blackberry.com/support/bbm"
Thank you for reporting your problem to BlackBerry Support
Use this option ONLY if you have been provided with an email address by somebody at BlackBerry Support.
When advised by BlackBerry Support, you can send your report via email.
Would you like to try to send the report again?
Your report information is securely encrypted to protect it in transit.
Your report information was securely encrypted to protect it in transit.
Unable to save the picture. Please make sure there is sufficient space and try again.
Unable to access the picture at this time. Please try again later.
"You need to sign in using your BlackBerry ID to access the following application: BBM"
"If you already have a BlackBerry ID, sign in now. If you're new to BlackBerry, you need to create a BlackBerryID."
Let your friends know that BBM is now available on Android and iOS
Chat and share with friends on BBM. Click Continue to add friends already using BBM.
"Are you sure you don't want to add contacts?"
Get more friends in on the conversation. Invite them to join BBM.
"We just found this contact on BBM so we'll invite them directly."
You can now start video and voice chats from BBM (if supported).
A problem has occurred in BBM. Please try again later.
Stay in touch like never before with BlackBerry Messenger.
Back-up file is not valid, you must exit BBM setup and use the Device Switch utility in BlackBerry Desktop Software.
There is no BBM account associated with this email address. Select another email address and try again.
A temporary server error has occurred. Please try again.
Please ensure the device time is correctly set and try again.
BBM is unable to connect to the server. Please try again later.
"Your BlackBerry ID %1$s doesn't match the one associated with the backup file."
"You can choose another restore option, or delete your device data and sign in with the BlackBerry ID that's associated with the backup file."
Your connection to the wireless network is turned off. Restore your connections and try again.
BBM has lost its connection. Please wait while the server attempts to reconnect.
You need a data plan to use BBM. Please contact your service provider for details.
The BlackBerry ID %1$s is already associated with BBM on another device
Cannot switch BBM to the current device.
A newer version of BBM is required.
Do you want to switch your BBM information to your current device?
You are signed in with the following BlackBerry ID: %1$s
"If you're an existing BBM user, you can restore BBM. If you're new to BBM, continue to get started."
Learn more about restoring BBM data.
A PIN uniquely identifies you in BBM. People can invite you to become BBM contacts if you share your BBM PIN or barcode.
is already associated with BBM on another device.
Invite your friends to chat over BBM
You can scan a BBM barcode to quickly add someone that you have just met.
Contacts can be added to this list when ignoring an invitation or deleting a contact.
Contacts or groups can be added to this list when viewing your BBM updates.
You can find friends already on BBM. You can change this options in your BBM Settings.
